article.headline: Bowling Green 71, Troy 69
article.story: BOWLING GREEN, Ohio (AP) -- Martin Samarco scored 29 points and hit a jumper at the buzzer to lead Bowling Green to a 71-69 win over Troy on Saturday. Ryne Hamblet had 16 points and 9 rebounds, and Erik Marschall added 10 for the Falcons (3-2). Bowling Green was up by 11 with less than three minutes remaining when Troy (4-4) went on a 14-3 run that included 7 points from O'Darien Bassett, who finished with 22. Samarco's game-winning shot was initially ruled a 3-pointer, but a video review showed he was inside the arc. The win gave coach Dan Dakich 146 victories, tying him for fourth on Bowling Green's coaching list with John Weinert. Richard Chaney had 19 points for the Trojans, and Sammy Sharp had 13 rebounds. Troy out-rebounded the Falcons 43-35 but shot just 36 percent from the floor.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
